thread.title: Ex-Russian spy poisoned with nerve agent - UK police

title: Ex-Russian spy poisoned with nerve agent - UK police
text:
Ex-Russian spy poisoned with nerve agent - UK police 2:51am IST - 01:21 
British police say they are treating the poisoning, with a nerve agent, of former Russian spy Sergei Skripal and his daughter as attempted murder. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
British police say they are treating the poisoning, with a nerve agent, of former Russian spy Sergei Skripal and his daughter as attempted murder. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2I9P5iz
